description.value:
Restores a sense. Poor: -20 to tests involving the sense, Good: gain relevent Heightened Senses Talent, and +20 to resists to resist attacks to that sense, such as blinding flashes. Advanced Cybernetic Eyes may count as Photo-visors/magnifying lenses, or Dark Sight. Cybernetic Ears may include Micro-beads (these would be seperate acquisitions that upgrade existing)

Requirements

Advanced cybernetic eyes may also act as a scope (telescopic sight, photo-scope, etc), advanced hearing may include Microbead.

Effect: Rare / Initiated

Notes: 2250 T 15 R
